      • createSourceDocument

        @Transactional
public void createSourceDocument(SourceDocument aDocument,
                                                User aUser)
                                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryService
        Creates a SourceDocument in a database. The source document is created by ROLE_ADMIN or Project admins. Source documents are created per project and it should have a unique name in the Project it belongs. renaming a a source document is not possible, rather the administrator should delete and re create it.
        Specified by:
        createSourceDocument in interface RepositoryService
        Parameters:
        aDocument - SourceDocument to be created
        aUser - The User who perform this operation
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • exportAnnotationDocument

        @Transactional
public File exportAnnotationDocument(SourceDocument aDocument,
                                                    String aUser,
                                                    Class aWriter,
                                                    String aFileName,
                                                    Mode aMode)
                                             throws org.apache.uima.UIMAException,
                                                    IOException,
                                                    ClassNotFoundException
        A new directory is created using UUID so that every exported file will reside in its own directory. This is useful as the written file can have multiple extensions based on the Writer class used.
        Specified by:
        exportAnnotationDocument in interface RepositoryService
        Parameters:
        aDocument - The SourceDocument where we get the id which hosts both the source Document and the annotated document
        aUser - the User who annotates the document.
        aWriter - the DKPro Core writer.
        aFileName - the file name.
        aMode - the mode.
        Returns:
        a temporary file.
        Throws:
        org.apache.uima.UIMAException - if there was a conversion error.
        IOException - if there was an I/O error.
        ClassNotFoundException - if the DKPro Core writer could not be found.

      • getAnnotationDocumentContent

        @Transactional

        aUser - the user.
        Returns:
        the JCas.
        Throws:
        org.apache.uima.UIMAException - if a conversion error occurs.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        ClassNotFoundException - if a DKPro Core reader/writer cannot be loaded.
